特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
IMPORTANT NOTICE:

This course is conducted in lecture format. Please note the following:
1. For all students: assignments will be posted on LUNA weekly, along with important announcements about the course, and so it is critical that students log in to LUNA regularly during this course.
2. Some lectures may be posted online in lieu of face to face lectures (the URL will be provided on LUNA) -- information about any lecture to be posted online instead of face to face will be announced on LUNA.
